main event: Radar detected a blip in Denver, Colorado, described as a UFO that exhibited jerky movements and gradually diminished in size.
interesting points: The radar blip was the size of a quarter., The object moved in a jerky manner., The size of the object appeared to diminish during the observation., The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes., The source of the observation was civilian with ground-radar.
witness description: No formal witnesses confirmed but observed by radar.
